response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and your keen interest, I believe it's only fair that we discuss a price that reflects both the product's worth and your potential benefit. Considering the product's true value and your anticipated use, I propose a price of $12,000. This offer stands as a testament to my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and surpass your expectations. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 12000}
